rules_text:
First strike
When this creature enters, create a Blade token. [i](It’s an equipment artifact with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {1}.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](Cast when you attack with a single creature.)[/i]
If this is the first combat phase this turn, untap target creature. After this phase there is an additional combat phase.
